```{r}
library( dataWorkshop)
```
Now start by loading some data. 
```{r}
data( AudiA4)
Y<- AudiA4$price
X<- AudiA4$mileage
````
 And the required scatterplot
 
```{r}
plot( X,Y)
```

Display as code but do not run (in case it has an error)
```
plot(X1,Y)
```
